title: Community Readiness
description: Prepare for new maintainers: (1) contribution path and onboarding, (2) GitHub issue templates, (3) clear roadmap, (4) good first issue labels, (5) migration guide for early adopters.

title: Add MCP server integration tests
description: Create test/server.test.ts with tests for protocol compliance, efrit_execute with different types, multi-instance routing, error responses, and timeout scenarios. Mock file system for CI/CD.

title: Validate Core Workflows End-to-End
description: Test each workflow: (1) efrit-chat - basic conversation, (2) efrit-do - sync command execution, (3) efrit-do-async - async execution (currently broken?), (4) efrit-remote-queue - AI-to-AI communication. Document what works and what's broken honestly.

title: Create ONBOARDING.md for new maintainers
description: Create onboarding guide: Efrit in 5 Minutes (demo GIF), Core Philosophy (Pure Executor), What's Working/Broken (honest list), Quick Wins (good first issues), How to Get Help (Discord/Discussions).

title: Modernize Development Experience
description: Add modern tooling: (1) efrit-run-tests and efrit-version functions, (2) CI/CD pipeline for Emacs 28.1/28.2/29.1, (3) DEVELOPMENT.md onboarding guide, (4) better logging and error recovery, (5) performance monitoring.

title: Complete MCP Server Implementation
description: MCP server is 50% complete. Need: (1) actual server.ts implementation with protocol handler, (2) tool registration (efrit_execute, efrit_list_instances), (3) request routing to queue system, (4) error handling and logging, (5) integration tests. See docs/mcp-implementation-plan.md for details.

title: Add efrit-run-tests and efrit-version utility functions
description: Add to lisp/efrit.el: (1) efrit-run-tests - run all tests interactively, (2) efrit-version - show version and health check status, (3) efrit-doctor - validate installation.

title: Fix Tool Selection Loop Prevention
description: Address todo_get_instructions infinite loops. Implement: (1) Schema-based prevention (dynamic tool schemas per workflow state), (2) Circuit breaker (hard limits on tool calls), (3) Better loop detection and recovery. See ARCHITECTURE.md anti-patterns.

title: Simplify async execution architecture
description: Current async system is complex with efrit-async, efrit-unified, efrit-context, efrit-protocol. Consider unified efrit-executor with modes (sync/async/auto). Fewer moving parts = easier maintenance.

title: Fix MCP Server Dependencies
description: MCP server npm install failing with missing module errors (resolve.exports). Run 'cd mcp && npm install --force' to fix. Prevents MCP server development.

title: Implement MCP server.ts with protocol handler
description: Create mcp/src/server.ts with MCP protocol compliance, configuration loading, tool registration, request routing, and error handling. See Phase 2.1 in mcp-implementation-plan.md.

title: Implement efrit_execute tool with parameter validation
description: Add efrit_execute tool to MCP server with validation, routing to appropriate Efrit instance via queue, and response formatting. Support command/eval/chat types.

title: Create DEVELOPMENT.md onboarding guide
description: Create developer onboarding with: Quick Start (5 min), Architecture in 2 Minutes (Zero Client-Side Intelligence), Common Tasks (adding tools, debugging loops, testing with real API).

title: Add TROUBLESHOOTING.md guide
description: Create troubleshooting guide covering: test infrastructure issues, MCP server errors, tool selection loops, async workflow problems, common Emacs/Elisp issues.

title: Update ROADMAP.md with realistic milestones
description: Update plans/ROADMAP.md: v0.4.0 (fix foundation), v0.5.0 (stability), v1.0.0 (production ready). Remove outdated critical issues. Focus on working incrementally.

title: Improve error recovery and logging
description: Centralize logging with efrit-log function (levels: DEBUG/INFO/WARN/ERROR). Add efrit--safe-execute for comprehensive error handling with recovery hints. Add *efrit-log* buffer.

title: Fix Test Infrastructure
description: Test runner scripts are missing. Makefile references non-existent test/efrit-test-simple.sh. Create basic test runner and document existing tests. Critical blocker for development.

title: Add GitHub issue templates
description: Create .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/ with: bug_report.md (Emacs version, API key check, minimal repro), feature_request.md (must align with Pure Executor principle), documentation.md.

title: Efrit Modernization for Community Readiness
description: Modernize Efrit's infrastructure, documentation, and development experience before new maintainers join. Focus on: (1) fixing broken test/build infrastructure, (2) completing MCP server, (3) consolidating scattered documentation, (4) adding modern dev tooling and CI/CD.

title: Implement schema-based tool prevention
description: Create efrit-do--get-tools-for-state that returns different tool schemas based on workflow state: planning (todo_*), executing (eval_sexp, shell_exec), error-recovery. Prevent Claude from calling wrong tools.

title: Consolidate Documentation
description: Documentation is scattered across 9+ files in plans/ with contradictory status updates. Create single source of truth (STATUS.md), archive stale planning docs, update README with realistic capabilities, add troubleshooting guide.

title: Create STATUS.md as single source of truth
description: Create STATUS.md documenting: current state, what works/doesn't work, known issues (tool loops, async workflow), recent progress, critical blockers. Replace scattered status updates in plans/*.

title: Add circuit breaker for tool call limits
description: Track tool calls per session in efrit-do--tool-call-counts hash table. Block tools after max calls (e.g., 3 for todo_get_instructions). Return clear error to Claude about hitting limit.

title: Add MIGRATION.md for early adopters
description: Create migration guide for existing users: breaking changes in v0.4.0+, configuration updates, deprecated commands (efrit-command, efrit-agent), rollback instructions.

title: Consolidate module structure (17 modules â†’ cleaner org)
description: Reorganize lisp/ into: core/ (efrit-core, efrit-config, efrit-api), interfaces/ (efrit-chat, efrit-executor, efrit-queue), tools/ (efrit-tools, efrit-session). Reduce complexity from current 17 scattered modules.

title: Add CI/CD pipeline for multi-version Emacs testing
description: Create .github/workflows/test.yml to test on Emacs 28.1, 28.2, 29.1. Run make compile and make test. Use purcell/setup-emacs action.

title: Archive stale planning documents
description: Move outdated plans/* files to plans/archive/. Keep only: CURRENT_STATUS.md (replaced by STATUS.md), ROADMAP.md, AUTONOMOUS_MODE_DESIGN.md. Archive contradictory/outdated docs.

title: Add performance monitoring and metrics
description: Add efrit--metrics hash table to track: API call times, token usage, cache hit rates. Create efrit-show-metrics dashboard. Record with efrit--record-metric function.
